nodes.text: From 2014 to 2017, the first 35 episodes of Star Wars Rebels were adapted into German as full-cast audio dramas and released on CD and as digital downloads by Universal Music in Germany. The first album adapted the premiere TV movie, Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion, and the next 16, which are numbered starting at 1, each adapted two episodes through season 2, episode 20, The Mystery of Chopper Base. The 21st and final episode of season 2, Twilight of the Apprentice, was not adapted.
